column4: can someone tell me how to enable the 'mailto' option in the right click menu in xchat?
emachine t3882 with intel extreme graphics2 3d integrated
i can play these files in xp and have no such trouble.
it might be a sound config quirk ... are you against trying a different player?
no i am actually for it. i tried to use amarok but it is not compatible with the esd sound engine, supposedly.
oh, i was gonna recommend beep-media-player :)
there's no quicktime port for linux....install w32codecs for totem, or use a media player with it's own codecs if you want .mov support
installing the mplayer plugin would probably work
or you could just run a video player when a .mov file is detected...which is what i do
what's the command line for installing that?
